metadata.title: CVE-2019-5429 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
Untrusted search path in FileZilla before 3.41.0-rc1 allows an attacker togain privileges via a malicious 'fzsftp' binary in the user's homedirectory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5429` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

filezilla - 3.45.1-3
filezilla-common - 3.45.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: filezilla package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.45.1-3').
